ComicInfo.Summary:
Synergy escapes from Argos and returns to Skywatch. Winter learns that M.A.D.-1 has been reactivated in Russia but is forbidden from intervening as the nation has not asked the U.N. for help. Feeling the safety of his homeland overpowers his orders as a member of Stormwatch, Winter decides to go to Russia anyway and approaches Henry Bendix for help.
Cannon discovers that the solo mercenary life is not as black and white as he at first believed.
